com.dantann.recylerviewtemplate.framework

Class PresenterAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.dantann.recylerviewtemplate.framework.PresenterAdapter

  • public abstract class PresenterAdapter
extends <any>
    An abstract Adapter that uses ViewHolderPresenter to handle creating and binding its views. Presenters are stored in a map for quick reference.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected <any> mPresenterMap
      Map of current ViewHolderPresenter that is mapped by an integer.
